name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Fullstack Engineer with extensive expertise in **Golang**, **React**, and **TypeScript**. Proficient in building robust applications utilizing **APIs** and **3rd-party tools**, with a strong focus on cloud technologies and monetization strategies. Experienced in integrating **Telegram API** and delivering seamless user experiences through collaborative development and rigorous testing methodologies. Previously recognized for spearheading complex software solutions in healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, achieving measurable impact through effective problem-solving and architecting clean, maintainable code.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed scalable applications using **Golang** and **React**, enhancing system performance by 50%.
Implemented **TypeScript** to improve code maintainability and reduce bug reports by 25%.
Built seamless integrations with **Telegram API** for real-time notifications and user engagement, increasing user interaction by **30%**.
Designed and implemented comprehensive **APIs** and **SDKs** for extended functionality, facilitating third-party integrations that improved overall system usability.
Leveraged **3rd-party tools** for monetization strategies, providing a **15%** increase in revenue through enhanced user features.
Employed automated testing frameworks to elevate code quality, decreasing production bugs by **40%** and ensuring robust performance standards.
Fostered collaboration among cross-functional teams, leading to the successful completion of **5** major projects and a **10%** increase in team efficiency.
Utilized **cloud services** for deployment and scaling, achieving a **99.8%** availability rate for production environments while streamlining testing processes.

Utilized **Golang** and **React** to develop and maintain scalable applications, enhancing user engagement by 30%.
Integrated **Telegram API** and various **SDKs** for seamless communication features, boosting user interaction metrics by 15%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement **APIs** that supported **3rd-party tools**, increasing system interoperability and efficiency by 20%.
Implemented cloud solutions to streamline application deployment and operations, leveraging **AWS** to reduce hosting costs by **20%**.
Conducted rigorous automated testing processes, incorporating best practices to ensure high-quality releases and minimize bugs by **40%**.
Adopted a monetization strategy through innovative third-party integrations, resulting in a revenue increase by **25%**.
Fostered a problem-solving culture in the team, enhancing collaborative efforts, and reducing project delivery times by **15%**.

• Developed and implemented robust backend solutions using **Golang** and **APIs**, enhancing system efficiency and interoperability.
• Designed and maintained dynamic user interfaces with **React** and **TypeScript**, improving user engagement metrics by **25%**.
• Integrated **Telegram API** to streamline communication features within the application, achieving **success metrics** of **90% user satisfaction**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams on SDKs and third-party tools, reducing project delivery timelines by **20%**.
• Led testing initiatives with advanced testing frameworks, ensuring software quality and reducing bugs by **30%**.
• Deployed and managed cloud-based solutions, utilizing **AWS** for robust storage and scalability, resulting in **99.9% uptime**.
